q1: What functions does this scientific calculator support?
a1: It supports basic arithmetic, trigonometric functions (sin, cos, tan and inverses), logarithms (ln, log), square root, power, factorial, and constants (pi, e).
q2: Can I switch between degrees and radians?
a2: Yes, use the DEG/RAD toggle to switch angle mode for trigonometric calculations.
q3: Does the calculator support keyboard input?
a3: Yes, you can type numbers and operators using your keyboard. Press Enter to calculate and Escape to clear.
a4: No. All calculations happen entirely in your browser. Nothing is sent to any server.
q5: Does it support order of operations?
a5: Yes, you can use parentheses to control the order of operations in complex expressions.
